title: 04 - Why You Need the Spirit AND Truth with Christine Caine
description:
Imagine you're sitting at dinner with us and we're talking about the Holy Spirit and truth and how we cannot separate the two. It's the only way forward. I cannot wait for you to hear this episode!

Thanks HelloFresh! Go to HelloFresh.com/MADEFORTHIS10 and use code MADEFORTHIS10 for 10 free meals, including free shipping.
